job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p>Position: Sr. Machine Learning Engineer</p><p>Location: Palo Alto, CA- Remote until Covid-19 but preferred Locals to CA</p><p>Duration: Contract or Contract to Hire</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>About the Role</p><p>The Sr. Machine Learning Engineer position is responsible for researching, building, and maintaining Machine Learning models for a large-scale distributed cloud platform to deliver application privacy</p><p>capabilities. The ideal candidate is also expected to mentor and work with a remarkably high performing software team</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>Responsibilities</p><p>As a senior staff member of a fast-growing early-stage startup, the Sr. ML Engineer will be accountable for Machine Learning and AI of the Data Secrets’ platform:</p><ul><li>Research, build and maintain Machine Learning models for highly scalable, performant and available platform</li><li>Integrate new data sources and workflows into the platform</li><li>Build and support machine learning workflows on the platform</li><li>Build distributed computing frameworks to process data</li><li>Performs data analysis required to troubleshoot data related issues</li><li>Be an innovator and lead development of Intellectual Property of Data Secrets</li><li>Drive innovation at the junction of cloud computing, distributed systems, data privacy and data sciencesWork closely with the product management team, and drive the ML technology &amp; architectural aspects of the product roadmap</li><li>Work closely with customers to build use cases and requirements for well-integrated solutions</li><li>Align the product with industry security standards, data privacy regimes' compliance</li><li>requirements and certifications for each of the focus industry verticals.</li><li>Evangelize Data Secrets in industry-wide AI and data privacy forums</li></ul>
